application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Change of use from  A4 (Public House) to D1 (community centre with prayer facilities)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (786/IDC/SU-100, 786/IDC/PP-200, 786/IDC/PP-102 Rev A, Heritage Statement: Received 21/02/2019. 
786/IDC/SU-300, Outline Construction Logistics Plan, Transport Statement: Received 26/02/2019. 
A Forward to the Scope of Works Schedule, Comment Response Note: Received 20/05/2019. 
Design, Access, Sustainability & Planning Statement: Received 01/07/2019.
Travel Plan, Comment Response Note - Version 3, July 2019: Received 11/07/2019.
786/IDC/PP-101 Rev B, 786/IDC/PP-100 Rev B: Received 17/07/2019.
786/IDC/IF-200 Rev A: Received 23/08/2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the approved drawings, before the use commences,
full details (including manufacturer?s specification) of secure covered
cycle parking facilities (for not less than 16 bicycles) for the persons
attending the premises shall have been submitted to and approved in
writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall
conform to current guidance such as the West London Cycle Parking
Guidance (WestTRANS) in design and layout and be fully implemented
and be made available for use before the first occupation of the
development and thereafter retained for use at all times without
obstruction.

Condition : 4 - Prior to the commencement of the use, a delivery and servicing plan
shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning
Authority, including a waste management and collection strategy. All
deliveries and servicing of the site shall thereafter be managed in
compliance with the approved Plan.

Condition : 5 - No live and/or amplified music or any other live and/or amplified noise shall be played
outside the premises hereby approved without the prior consent of the Local Planning
Authority.

Condition : 6 - The use of the hereby approved community centre and prayer facilities
shall not take place between the hours of midnight to 5 am on any day.

Condition : 7 - There shall be no outdoor activities performed between 9.00 pm and
9.00 am at all times.

Condition : 8 - The development shall not be occupied until the developer has entered into
a binding contract with the local highway authority to remove the
existing vehicular access from the public highway on Twickenham
Road, across the footway and into the site and to reinstate the public
footpath at this location, at the developers expense prior to occupation
of the building.
